title: #328:  C'est Fini!
description:
It takes a village to make a TV show, and it takes a village idiot to make a reunion. Come listen to us take apart the third and final installment of the "Real Housewives of New York" reunion. We talk about Sonja, LuAnn, Tom, Ramona -- everything. Plus, we're buttering our toast for "Below Deck," and we're tumbling dry our emotions for an explosive Dubai episode of "Real Housewives of Melbourne."

00:00:00 - Intro
00:06:19 - Crappens Mailbag
00:19:30 - Real Housewives of New York reunion pt. 3
01:11:00 - Below Deck
01:24:39 - Clear the Flem
01:28:17 - Real Housewives of Melbourne

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
